使用這個工具來探測航空器何時超出指定限制。 輸入零(0)刪除限制。
您將要創建一個包含活動選擇和視點的書簽。
與您的中隊和朋友分享任務報告會議！
別忘記在路由器裡打開這個埠！
只有高級版Tacview可以主持線上任務報告會議。
任何註冊版Tacview可以加入線上任務報告會議。
主持線上任務報告會議[{0}]
連接到線上任務報告會議[{0}]
Some data is missing; did you load the right file for this debriefing?
⚠ Failed to connect, please check the address and port number.
⚠ Failed to host session. Use a different port to host multiple sessions on the same computer.
⚠ Protocol not supported. Are you using the same version of Tacview as the host?

Shift+Click an object to attract viewers' attention
Press Alt+Enter to switch to fullscreen mode

You are temporarily in charge of the debriefing
此連接需要一個下有效的密碼
與資料記錄器建立連接以即時地檢查遙測資料！
僅有高級版Tacview可以記錄即時遙測。
可能需要密碼來加入私有會話
Failed to connect real-time telemetry to given host address.
Real-time telemetry not compatible with the host exporter.
當前重播與即時遙測不同步。
Import Falcon 4 *.flt files to review telemetry data in real-time!

As soon as your Falcon 4 flight has started, press the [F] key to start recording data. Falcon will generate *.flt files which will be read by Tacview and displayed in real-time in the 3D view.
*** NOTES ***
• You might want to force Falcon to inject colors and callsigns by pressing twice the [F] key during the flight. • Starting with BMS 4.36 Update 1, you need to set g_bTacviewAcmi 0 in "Falcon BMS User.cfg" file to create *.flt files.
Please select the Acmi folder where Falcon 4.0 stores its VHS And FLT files.
Listens to 1090MHz ADS-B radio signals to display aircraft around you in real-time!

Cannot find any supported USB radio device to read ADS-B signal. Check https://www.rtl-sdr.com for a list of RTL2832U compatible radio equipment, and make sure WinUSB is properly installed from https://zadig.akeo.ie

To record ADS-B radio signal in real-time, you need:
• RTL2832U compatible USB radio dongle (https://www.rtl-sdr.com) • 1090MHz antenna • 1090MHz ADS-B filter (optional) • WinUSB drivers for your dongle (https://zadig.akeo.ie)
Make sure everything is properly connected to your computer and configured, then click connect!
修正遙測時間或使用幻象模式來對比性能。
點擊並拖動進行平滑時間移動

Tacview將執行所有指定操作然後不顯示任何視窗退出。
使用最後已知的參數連接即時遙測。
使用最後已知的參數連接特定遙控。
Tacview將在所有指定操作完成後關閉。
可用於禁用匿名資料收集。
禁用頂點緩衝區物體以避免在一些ATI交火配置上崩潰。
顯示調試資訊以説明修補錯誤。
為每個Tacview實例以特定組合存儲使用者偏好設置。
To prevent Tacview from saving UI settings on exit.
如果所有打開的檔都是認證的，返回詢問-1。

為整個系統使用提供的秘鑰啟動Tacview。
Activate Tacview, for the current session only, with the provided key.
Display the frame-rate in the 3D view.
Declare additional custom directory where Tacview resources are stored.
Declares an additional custom folder from where to load add-ons.
Limits the maximum frame rate to reduce CPU usage as well as power consumption.

當此圖示可見時，所有飛行記錄將由模擬飛行軟體自動生成。 你在飛行時沒有必要保持Tacview運行。
Please update your graphics card driver

Playback of this file has been delayed by {0} minute(s) by the host. The last {1} minute(s) cannot be reviewed.
This file is authentic, it has not been altered since its recording.
This file is authentic, except for the last {0} seconds which cannot be validated.
為了確保公平遊戲避免作弊，請在使用Tacview前關閉IL-2 Sturmovik。

請仔細閱讀下列授權合約，你必須向下滾動至底部以繼續。
To register your product and unlock advanced features, enter the 25-character key you have received by email. If you do not have a product key yet, you can buy a new one.
If you already own a product key, enter it here. Otherwise, use the link below to purchase an upgrade.

To upgrade your product and unlock advanced features, enter the 25-character Tacview Advanced key you have received by email. If you do not have a Tacview Advanced product key yet, you can buy a new one.
If you already own a Tacview Advanced product key, enter it here. Otherwise, use the link below to purchase an upgrade.
此產品金鑰無效，請檢查金鑰並重試。

你的軟體副本已經註冊。請妥善保存你的產品金鑰，將來你可能需要重新安裝Tacview。
除了許多獨有的高級功能外，你現在享有優先技術支援以及特許管道獲得未來Tacview 2.x的更新和預覽。
瞭解更多關於使用註冊版本Tacview的優點
要使用此版本的Tacview，你需要註冊你的軟體副本。
To use this feature or version of Tacview you need a Tacview Advanced license.
Export telemetry data in a file readable by other tools. Properties are expressed in meters and degrees. The accuracy of calculated properties depends on recorded data availability and precision.

在當前任務裡無法通過快捷方式找到物體和時間參考。請確認打開了正確的檔且複製/粘貼了整個快捷方式。
